charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1101_0100_20:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] reached a
clearing in the woods, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Charizard.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1101_0200_20:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was entranced by Charizard’s visage,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a loud voice come from behind.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0401_0700_10: Yeah, no doubt about it! Watch this.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_0900_10: Yeah, no doubt about it! Watch this.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1000_10:
Red!
See? It reacted to Red’s name!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1100_10:
As a Fire-type Trainer myself, I’m personally
interested in Red and his Charizard.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0401_1300_10: Yeah, you hear a lot of stories about Red.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_1500_10: Yeah, you hear a lot of stories about Red.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1600_10:
Like how he single-handedly dismantled
Team Rocket, an organization that was
mistreating Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1700_10:
Not only that, but he also became the Champion
of the Kanto region!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_1800_10:
He’s a step above most of the Trainers on Pasio.
In fact, he’s probably more than just one step up.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_2200_10:
Huh. You don’t talk much, do you, Red? I guess
that cuts out a lot of meaningless conversation.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_2300_10:
And you snuck up on us completely silently just
now! When did you even get here? I didn’t notice
you at all!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_2400_10:
Speaking of... How do you give commands to
your Pokémon during battles?
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0301_2500_10:
Maybe they understand each other
without words?
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0302_2700_10: Maybe Charizard is calling the shots.
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_3100_10:
Whoa...did you hear that?
Did Red just talk?!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4500_10:
A bond so strong you don’t even need to say
anything... That’s how in sync they are!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_3900_10: You’re already pumped up to the max, huh?
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_4000_10: I gotta step up my game!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_0402_4100_10:
I’ll train up my Fire-type moves so much that I’ll
burn both Charizard and even Red to ashes!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4200_10:
Remember this day, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Remember the awe you felt when you gazed
upon a living legend!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4300_10: And let that awe fuel your training!
charaepi_ch0000_00_red/2301_1201_4400_10:
Those burning emotions are what give you
courage when you really need it!
